notes: Full catalog generated from commands_index.json (539+). Units: inputs mm/deg unless noted.

summary: Health check for MCP server ↔ Revit add-in round trip. Returns ok/message and light metadata.
Inspect layout settings of Rebar elements (shape-driven sets): rule, spacing, array length, flags.
Update layout rule/spacing/count for selected Rebar elements (shape-driven sets only). Alias: rebar_arrangement_update.
Find rebars hosted by selected host elements and update their layout in bulk (optional filter by Comments tag).
Resolve logical keys from RebarMapping.json for selected host elements (debug/inspection).
Build an auto-rebar plan for selected hosts (columns/beams) without modifying the model.
Apply an auto-rebar plan (or generate+apply from selection) to create rebars on valid hosts.
Compute and compare the current auto-rebar recipe signature vs the last stored signature in the in-model recipe ledger (per host).
Delete tagged tool-generated rebars in selected host(s), recreate from current plan, and update the in-model recipe ledger (signature).
Delete Rebar-like elements by elementId(s). Alias: delete_rebar. Supports dryRun and chunked transactions.
Move Rebar-like elements by elementId(s). Alias: move_rebar. Supports offsetMm/dx-dy-dz and items[] per-element offsets.
Retrieve Project Information element fields (name, number, client, address, etc.).
List open documents with link topology and worksharing flags.
Return the currently active view id.
Return visible element ids for the specified (or active) view.
Get element basics (category, family/type, level, coordinates). Use rich=true for extended fields.
List closed 2D regions (PlanTopology circuits) on a level where a Room can be placed. Returns centroid/labelPoint/area and optional boundary loops.
Place a Room into a PlanTopology circuit by index (or at a point). Optionally set name/number/department.
List wall instances (paged). Returns walls[] + wallsById{}; doubles in mm.
Create a wall from start/end (mm). heightMm supports numeric or 'level-to-level'. Base level required.
Set a wall instance parameter by name. Double expects mm; element id/name accepted.
Return Compound Structure layers (outside→inside) with materials and thicknessMm; includes core bounds.
Create a floor from boundary loops (mm) on a level.
List Floor types with filters/paging; doubles in mm.
List Compound Structure layers of a Basic Floor; returns totalThicknessMm and core boundaries.
Replace a floor’s boundary with new loops (mm).
Create grids by axis+positions or explicit segments (mm).
List levels; supports paging and meta-only when count=0.
Create a Room at (x,y) mm on a level (levelId or levelName). Defaults: autoTag=true, strictEnclosure=true; returns {ok, mode:created|existing, elementId, name, tagId?, location{xMm,yMm}, units}.
List rooms (paged). Returns rooms[] + roomsById{} with area (m²) and center (mm).
Apply fill color/transparency overrides to elements in a view. Skips safely if a View Template locks overrides.
Clear all graphic overrides (categories & elements) in a view; also handles temporary hide/isolate if possible.
Export visible elements of a view to DWG (As Displayed). Supports explicit Export Setup.
Enable/update a 3D view’s section box to fit specified element IDs with optional padding (mm).
Show a dockable pane (builtIn or guid).
explode model line to detail (Detail/Model Lines)
Generate area boundary lines from walls on a level. Supports items[] (elementIds) or time-slice with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.

Clean area boundary lines (merge duplicates, snap endpoints, delete isolated). Supports staged time-slice: stage=('merge'|'snap'|'delete'|'all'), startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx, and optional refreshView.
Create area(s) at given points. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Create area boundary line(s) on Area Plan. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Delete area(s). Supports areaIds[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Delete area boundary line(s). Supports elementIds[] or items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Extend area boundary line to intersect target. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Hide a dockable pane (builtIn or guid).
Move area(s) by dx/dy/dz in mm. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Move area boundary line(s) by dx/dy/dz (mm). Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Starts recording command operations. An output directory and filename prefix can be specified.
Trim area boundary line at intersection with target. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Update area parameter(s). Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
create revision cloud for element projection (Revision/Sheets)
Copy area boundary lines from rooms on a level. Supports items[] (roomIds) or time-slice with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Activate/open a specific view by id/uniqueId/name.
get area boundary lines in view (Views/Graphics)
get room boundary lines in view (Views/Graphics)
Open multiple views by id/uniqueId/name and activate the last.
List roofs with optional filters (type/level/nameContains). Supports _shape.page, idsOnly, summaryOnly, includeLocation.
Create a circular revision cloud by center/radius (mm) in a view.
Create one or many text notes. Batch supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and returns nextIndex.
List mass instances (FamilyInstance/DirectShape). Supports filters, _shape.page, idsOnly, summaryOnly, includeLocation.
List in-place family instances with filters. Supports _shape.page, idsOnly, summaryOnly.
List ceilings with filters. Supports _shape.page, idsOnly, summaryOnly, includeLocation.
Lock an existing Dimension or create-and-lock between two references. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Unlock a locked Dimension. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Create-and-lock an alignment Dimension between two references. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
Adjust one element along a dimension to match targetMm. Supports items[] with startIndex/batchSize/maxMillisPerTx and optional refreshView.
List unique ElementType ids used by elements visible in a view (optionally filtered by categories).
Get parameters for many ElementTypes in one paged call (SI-normalized via UnitHelper, plus display).
Get instance parameters for many elements by elementIds or categories with paging (SI-normalized).
Collect room boundary segments (with linkage + lengths), matched nearby walls, columns, and door/window inserts (hosted by matched walls) for finish takeoff workflows.
